result.execSummary:
The defendant Maurice M. McQueen was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Maurice M. McQueen is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Maurice M. McQueen was found guilty of Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).
  • Maurice M. McQueen was found guilty of Bail Jumping-Misdemeanor, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.49(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or will discharge with outstanding financial obligations due, a civil judgment shall be entered for the balance due.

Anger Management counseling and comply, psychological evaluation and comply, complete domestic violence counseling and comply.  No contact with Amari Clay, Darla Schaefer, or Jamie Valliant, may have contact with Jamie Valliant only for child exchange.  No contact with Howard Woods Apts. or the premises.  May request early termination of probation after two years with successful completion of conditions of probation.  Ct. 2 DISMISSED.  

11/23/15  AMENDED** Probation term is 2 years.

Defendant Maurice M. McQueen in court with attorney Peter Michael Masana.  Christine M. Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Cases called 14CM403, 15CM88, & 15CM87.  In 15CM87 defendant plead no contest to Ct. 1 and Ct. 3.  In 15CM88 defendant pled no contest to Cts. 7 & 8.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  14CM403 dismissed but read in.  In 15CM87  Ct. 1  armed enhancer dismissed.  Ct. 2 Dismissed but read in.  On 15CM88 Ct. 7 Court dismissed enhancer.  Ct. 1 & 3 Dismissed but read in.  Cts. 2,4,5, & 6 dismissed.  On 15CM87 Ct. 1 and 3 Court withheld sentencing placed defendant on probation for 3 years.  Conditions of probation include: Ct. 1 $443.00 costs,  Ct. 3 $243.00 costs, Anger management classes and comply, psychological evaluation and comply, complete domestic violence counseling and comply.  No contact with A.C. D.S. or Howard Woods Apts or premises.  No contact with J.V. except for child exchange.   In 15CM88 Court withheld sentence, placed defendant on probation for 3 years on Cts. 7 & 8. Ct. 7 $443.00 costs.  Ct. 8 $243.00 costs. Conditions of probation include:  Restitution $220.00.  Anger management counseling and comply, psychological evaluation and comply, complete domestic violence counseling and comply.  No contact with A.C. D.S. or Howard Woods Apts or premises.  No contact with J.V. except for child exchange.  May request early termination after 2 years with successful completion of conditions of probation.  No credit due.
